headline: Awesome place to work
status:
29 November 2017
"Awesome place to work"
5.0
★★★★★
Current Employee
pros: I've been working at i-Cherry for the better part of the last four years. It is the best environment I've worked at, well, ever! People are so friendly and always happy to help, and the offices are a thing of beauty. There's real concern with every individual that works here.
cons: There still room for improvement in the standardization of some internal processes, but managing is already working on it.
advice_to_mgmt: Keep up the good work and don't forget about the people. People is what makes this a great place to work.

headline: SEM Account Manager
pros: Opportunity, Culture, Exposure to large clients and top of market team
cons: No big cons apart from low salary

headline: Media Supervisor
pros: The Agency offers a great environment to work. Developing employees and sharing the company's accomplishments with the team and is highly positive to one's career.
cons: There is no clear career plan and the ways to grow can be confusing to some employees. The family spirit can be problematic sometimes, and people might take feedbacks personal.
